newsitem.title: USA: Nebraska fed cattle slow at $103/dressed - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Nebraska fed cattle slow at $103/dressed - USDA.

text.p: Trading on slaughter steers and heifers not developed as yet on a live basis, but dressed basis sales were steady to $1.00 per cwt lower, USDA said.
Buyer inquiry good. Seller interest only fair as most still geared to a $104.00/dressed pricing stance.
Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink.
Slaughter Steers - No confirmed sales on a live basis; dressed basis 1200-1300 lbs 103.00.
Slaughter Heifers - No confirmed sales on a live basis; dressed basis 1050-1225 lbs 103.00.
For week - 8,400 Sm Pd Lst Wk - 12,700 Sm Pd Lst Yr - 14,400
